Hi, Inder here! I am a Senior Data Scientist with over 7 years of experience in developing and deploying data-driven solutions across various industries. My expertise spans machine learning, deep learning, and edge AI, where I've led end-to-end projects that deliver measurable business impact.

Throughout my career, I have been solving complex problems using cutting-edge technologies and advanced analytics. My work has often focused on real-time, intelligent systems, leveraging these technologies to create scalable, efficient models that operate seamlessly.


Checkout my [portfolio](portfolio.qmd) for more information on all these.
<br>


### Background

I graduated from St. Stephen's College, Delhi and did a masters in Computational science from University College Dublin, where my thesis was in
machine learning.
